data.title: Did you know you could get these trophies n Keep?
data.description:
Welcome to the Keep world. Here are various trophies prepared for you. We just want you to know, every effort counts.

Check out all these silverwares, How many have you unlocked?

data.title: Self-discipline
data.description: Self-discipline trophies record every small progress you make. Fighting with inertia helps you become a better you. Guess which two can be acquired only through Keep Yoga, a new app from recently released by our team. You can use your Keep Trainer account to log in, and all data will be synced.

data.title: Walk the talk
data.description: Unlock these trophies by reaching corresponding steps in a day.

data.title: Train like an animal
data.description:
Cat, bird, dog, sheep, cattle, swan……
Have you tried to complete exercises inspired from animals. Harvest the animal spirit with specific trainings.
